bibl.title: A Name List on Claudiusâ€™s Letter to the Alexandrians (P.Lond. VI 1912)
bibl.seg: Lincoln H. Blumell, A Name List on Claudius's Letter to the Alexandrians (P.Lond. VI 1912).

Publication of a list of names that appears between columns two and three of Claudius's letter to the Alexandrians (P.Lond. VI 1912). Though the hand of the list is different from the hand of the letter, it shares paleographic and onomastic parallels with other documents in the archive of Nemesion.
bibl.note: Publication of a list of names that appears between columns two and three of Claudius's letter to the Alexandrians (P.Lond. VI 1912). Though the hand of the list is different from the hand of the letter, it shares paleographic and onomastic parallels with other documents in the archive of Nemesion.
